casebody.data:
IN RE: A.R.A., P.Z.A., Z.K.A. 65A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 1, 2019 Sydney J. Batch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher M. Watford, Attorney at Law, for Akers, Aaron. Charles E. Wilson, Jr., Attorney at Law, Shelby, for Cleveland County Department of Social Services.

William L. Esser, IV, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2019 by Respondent-Father to Stay Briefing Schedule:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of May 2019. Appellant briefs for both the Respondent-Mother and Respondent-Father shall be due 30 days from the date of this Order, and subsequent briefs shall be due in accordance with the Rules of Appellate Procedure."
